name: The Forest Below (Hans Dovenschmitz)
description:
A casual story/puzzle game set in a magical forest. You control a lost little girl and a large stone golem trying to help her. Together you have to solve puzzles and get through the foreign and dangerous forest

Controls:

A and D to move,  Q to switch between characters.

As the girl press space to jump.

As the golem press space to pick up girl (if close enough).
